mapper.select: select t1.device_id as deviceId, t1.imei_code as deviceIMEI, t1.device_name as deviceName, t1.device_mobile as deviceMobile, t1.power as devicePower, t1.status as deviceStatus, DATE_FORMAT(t1.online_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') onlineTime, DATE_FORMAT(t1.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') deviceCreateTime, t1.bluetooth_status from device t1 where t1.imei_code=#{deviceIMEI}
SELECT t1.deviceId FROM device t1 WHERE t1.deviceIMEI =#{deviceIMEI}

SELECT t2.device_id as deviceId, t1.NAME, t1.mobile, t1.address, t2.imei_code as deviceIMEI, t2.online_time as onlineTime, m.locationType, m.latitude, m.longitude, m.locationTime, t1.famillyPhones FROM (SELECT CONCAT(o.surname,o.name) as NAME, o.mobile, o.address, o.device_id, GROUP_CONCAT(e.mobile) as famillyPhones FROM old_man o LEFT JOIN emergency e ON o.old_man_id=e.old_man_id GROUP BY o.old_man_id) t1,device t2 LEFT JOIN (SELECT t3.device_id as deviceId, t3.location_type as locationType, t3.latitude as latitude, t3.longitude as longitude, t3.location_time as locationTime FROM location t3,(SELECT MAX(l.location_time) as location_time ,l.device_id FROM location l GROUP BY l.device_id) t2 WHERE t3.location_time =t2.location_time AND t3.device_id=t2.device_id) m ON t2.device_id=m.deviceId WHERE t2.device_id=t1.device_id ORDER BY m.locationTime DESC
